Nice quite mindful cafe in Kong meng shan monastery. Very peaceful and nice. Very good to visit and nice vegetarian food. It's a nice place to visit for lunch. Place for meditation and peaceful living.

Good

Really love the vibe here at Zen cafe. So calming and relaxing, true to the spirit of its name and its location at the monastery. Vegetarian snacks were tasty and filling enough. There is a limited menu to choose from but sufficiently satisfying for a light and quick bite.

The indoor cafe is definitely a great place to chill because it's not crowded, good vibe and ambiance (must have had a good ID designer), plenty of seating and even huge ceiling space. Location is inside the Guang Ming San (Brighthill) Temple.

Food is alright (just vegetarian snacks) but I was suprised that the cold brew had sugar in it which is a No-no.

I will probably hang out here again if I go to this temple.
